Title: And Now for Something Completely Different
Writer: Graham Chapman (screen foreplay & conception), John Cleese (screen foreplay & conception), Terry Gilliam (screen foreplay & conception), Eric Idle (screen foreplay & conception), Terry Jones (screen foreplay & conception), Michael Palin (screen foreplay & conception)
Actors: Graham Chapman, John Cleese, Terry Gilliam, Eric Idle
Plot: An anthology of the best sketches from the first and second seasons of Monty Python's Flying Circus (1969).
